content.text: Mr. BIGGS. Mr. Speaker, I move that the House do now adjourn.
content.speaker: Mr. BIGGS

content.text:
The motion was agreed to; accordingly (at 9 o'clock and 14 minutes 
p.m.), under its previous order, the House adjourned until tomorrow, 
Thursday, November 2, 2017, at 10 a.m. for morning-hour debate.
content.speaker: The RECORDER
